sentence.Network_en: The seven remaining poppy - growing provinces are all in the Pashto - speaking south, where the Taliban's writ runs.
sentence.Network_cn: 仍在种植罂粟的7个省份,都位于讲普什图语的南部地区, 那里也是塔利班的势力范围.

means.word_mean: 1. an Iranian language spoken in Afghanistan and Pakistan; the official language of Afghanistan

auth_sentence.content: Mahmoud was speaking Pashto, then Dari, then Pashto again.

auth_sentence.content: Interestingly, most of the men around us were speaking Pashto language and the almost all the females were speaking Dari.
